citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The licensee has not developed and documented an environmental enhancement plan to promote the psychological well-
being of the birds housed at the facility. The licensee currently has a few parrots, emu, and a variety of species of poultry.
They are providing varied perches, substrate to scratch in, varied foods, and forms of enrichment, but lack a written plan.
Lack of an environmental enhancement plan does not ensure that adequate and appropriate measure to promote the
psychological well-being of the birds are being provided. The licensee must develop, document and follow a species-
appropriate plan that promotes the psychological well-being of the birds, and the plan must be approved by the attending
veterinarian.
***Correct by March 11th, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensees.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The licensee has not developed and documented an environmental enhancement plan to promote the psychological well-
being of the birds housed at the facility. The licensee currently has a few parrots, emu, and a variety of species of poultry. 
They are providing varied perches, substrate to scratch in, varied foods, and forms of enrichment, but lack a written plan. 
Lack of an environmental enhancement plan does not ensure that adequate and appropriate measure to promote the 
psychological well-being of the birds are being provided. The licensee must develop, document and follow a species-
appropriate plan that promotes the psychological well-being of the birds, and the plan must be approved by the attending 
veterinarian.  
 
***Correct by March 11th, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensees.
